H0.text: Bearoff, Nullo Play and Quadrant are all terms used in which board game. Backgammon

H1.text: Bearoff, Nullo Play and Quadrant are all terms used in which board game. Chess

H2.text: Bearoff, Nullo Play and Quadrant are all terms used in which board game. Checkers

H3.text: Bearoff, Nullo Play and Quadrant are all terms used in which board game. Nardshir

A4.text: When all of a player's pieces are in that player's home board, that player may start removing them; this is called 'bearing off'.

A5.text: A player who bears off all fifteen pieces when the opponent has borne off at least one, wins a single game worth 1 point.
